audioText: Je verrai mes amis demain soir au restaurant pour célébrer l'anniversaire de Marie.
question: What will the speaker do tomorrow evening?
options: See friends at a restaurant to celebrate Marie's birthday
See friends at home to celebrate Marie's birthday
Call friends to celebrate Marie's birthday
Meet friends at work to celebrate Marie's birthday
explanation: The speaker said 'Je verrai mes amis demain soir au restaurant pour célébrer l'anniversaire de Marie' - I will see my friends tomorrow evening at the restaurant to celebrate Marie's birthday. 'Verrai' is the future tense of 'voir' (to see).
